error.defaultMessage: Error! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
error.PasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters.
error.PasswordRequiresDigit: Password must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
error.PasswordRequiresUpper: Password must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').
error.PasswordRequiresLower: Password must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
error.PasswordIsNullOrEmpty: Password cannot be null or empty.
error.PasswordIsTheSame: New password must be different from the current one.
error.PasswordFailedUpdate: Password could not be updated. Please try again later.
error.EmailTaken: This email address is already taken.
error.EmailIsTheSame: New email must be different from the current one.
error.EmailIsTaken: Email is already in use by someone else.
error.EmailIsNullOrEmpty: Email cannot be null or empty.
error.EmailFailedUpdate: Email could not be updated. Please try again later.
error.KvkExists: This Kvk number is already registered.
error.IncorrectPassword: Incorrect password. Please check your password and try again.
error.UserNotFound: No user found with the provided email address.
error.PasswordMismatch: Password and confirmation password do not match.
error.ResearchNotFound: The research could not be found.
error.ResearchFailedToBeCreated: The research could not be created.
error.ResearchFailedDelete: The research could not be deleted.
error.ResearchFailedUpdate: The research could not be updated.
error.ParticipantNotFound: The participant could not be found.
error.ParticipantAlreadyEnrolled: The participant has already joined this research.
error.ParticipantIsNotInResearch: The participant is not in this research.
error.CompanyNotFound: The company could not be found.
error.CompanyFailedCreate: The company could not be created.
error.CompanyFailedDelete: The company could not be deleted.
error.CompanyFailedUpdate: The company could not be updated.
error.DisabilityNotFound: The disability could not be found.
error.DisabilityFailedCreate: The disability could not be created.
error.DisabilityFailedUpdate: The disability could not be updated.
error.DisabilityFailedDelete: The disability could not be deleted.
error.PanelMemberNotFound: The panel member could not be found.
error.PanelMemberFailedCreate: The panel member could not be created.
error.PanelMemberFailedUpdate: The panel member could not be updated.
error.PanelMemberFailedDelete: The panel member could not be deleted.
error.PanelMemberHasDisability: The panel member already has this disability.
error.PanelMemberDoesNotHaveDisability: The panel member does not have this disability.
error.OrganizerNotFound: The organizer could not be found.
error.OrganizerNotTheSame: The organizer is incorrect. It needs to be the same.

success.UserHasBeenCreated: Your account has been successfully created. You can now log in.
success.UserHasLoggedIn: You have successfully logged in. Redirecting you to the portal.
success.ResearchHasBeenCreated: The research has been successfully created.
success.ResearchHasBeenUpdated: The research has been successfully updated.
success.ResearchHasBeenDeleted: The research has been successfully deleted.
success.ParticipantHasJoined: You have successfully joined the research.
success.ParticipantHasLeft: You have successfully left the research.
success.CompanyProfileUpdated: You have successfully updated your company profile.
success.PanelMemberProfileUpdated: You have successfully updated your profile.
success.DisabilityHasBeenUpdated: You have successfully updated your disability.
success.EmailHasBeenUpdated: You have successfully updated your email.
success.PasswordHasBeenUpdated: You have successfully updated your password.
